lst.name: sentence
lst.str: For cash alternatives of more than 10 mln Avana shares, Morgan Grenfell, as agent for participants, will make a separate offer to purchase at 300p per share, net of expenses, up to 46.3 mln Ranks Hovis new shares to which such shareholders will be entitled under the increased offer.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Ranks Hovis said that full acceptance of the increased offer would result in the issue of a maximum of 72.3 mln new Ranks Hovis shares or about 20 pct of the enlarged issued ordinary share capital of the company.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Avana shares traded at 800p after the announcement, 32p up from last night's close of 768p.
